sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to CliniQX. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy will inform you about how we handle your personal data when you visit our website and inform you of your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

sections.title: 2. Personal Data
sections.content: We collect minimal personal data necessary for the operation of our services. This may include contact information such as your name and email address when you sign up.

sections.title: 3. No Data Sharing
sections.content: We do not share your personal data with third parties. All personal information collected is used solely for the purpose of providing and improving our services.

sections.title: 4. Security of Your Data
sections.content: The security of your data is important to us. We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete any personal information we have collected. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us directly.

sections.title: 6. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at info@cliniqx.com.
